name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Northwind Inn & Suites

reviews.text: Easy location to find south of Portland. 6 miles to excellent shopping at Washington Square Mall (way better than downtown Portland and Lloyd Ct). 2 miles to Bridgeport Village for more excellent shopping and restaurants. Very disapointed in the Woodburn outlets.Tullalip in Washington state alot better we thought. Albertson's across the street and pub at corner not bad if you can stand the cigarette smoke.
reviews.title: Great Location for Shopping

likes.liked: — good value and close to good shopping

reviews.text: I stayed one nigh in this hotel, and was happily surprised. Room was very large, you even get a couch. Free wifi and free hot breakfast (good one) are offered. The parking is large.
reviews.title: Very comfortable hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is conveniently located on the highway 99w ; rooms are quiet.
reviews.title: Best Western very comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are a lot of restaurants and malls around the hotel.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay and pet friendly

likes.liked: — Good location, close to much of the Portland area but not located downtown

reviews.title: Average accomodations
reviews.text: Given its low price (<100$) and high quality, it is a very good choice. I recommend it.
